about_the_game:
1943 The US Navy conducted a secret high-energy physics experiment in a dock in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, also known as the Rainbow Project.
Make a escort destroyer, the Eldridge, invisible in the eyes of the observer.
However, this experiment happened to open up the link channel with the second world. Now this channel has been reopened, and the dangerous exploration journey begins.
Driving advanced fighters to take off from an aircraft carrier and use Aviation shell Launch missile to close combat with enemy fighters.
Close look ship girl dance on the aircraft carrier.
Visit the most advanced aircraft carrier walk on the deck.
now 4 aircraft had include,we will add more fighter .
The most intense air battle from ocean to morden city to SI-FI WORLD .
rc mode is new Play in the game.

this demo only contain 2 aircraft 2maps.
detailed_description:
1943 The US Navy conducted a secret high-energy physics experiment in a dock in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, also known as the Rainbow Project.
Make a escort destroyer, the Eldridge, invisible in the eyes of the observer.
However, this experiment happened to open up the link channel with the second world. Now this channel has been reopened, and the dangerous exploration journey begins.
Driving advanced fighters to take off from an aircraft carrier and use Aviation shell Launch missile to close combat with enemy fighters.
Close look ship girl dance on the aircraft carrier.
Visit the most advanced aircraft carrier walk on the deck.
now 4 aircraft had include,we will add more fighter .
The most intense air battle from ocean to morden city to SI-FI WORLD .
rc mode is new Play in the game.

this demo only contain 2 aircraft 2maps.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel i6
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1080
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Driving advanced fighters to take off from an aircraft carrier and close combat with enemy fighters
